DOC.brief_summary: This study aim determine sero-prevalence anti-pertussis antibody among healthcare professional hospital centre Spain .
DOC.brief_title: Sero-prevalence Anti-pertussis Antibodies Disease Awareness Among Spanish Healthcare Professionals
DOC.criteria: Written inform consent obtain subject . Subjects investigator believe comply requirement protocol . Male female healthcare professional age ≥18 year select hospital . Healthcare professional frequent contact patient hospital . Agreeing collection blood sample study . • Medical student work healthcare professional .
